value:
Everyone loves delicious food; maybe
I should pick up some for a gift! And I
am getting pretty hungry myself...

Do you know what kind of gift would
show unwavering gratitude? It's gotta
be...sturdy, so I don't break it.

Sounds like the festival feast is in full
swing over there! Busting through the
wall would be the quickest way in...

Lady Elise is so good at gift-giving. I
hope I can reach her level one day!

Well, that's another one. No more
soft or small gifts. I'll just break
them all.

Hey there! I've got a gift from
$Nf for you.$k$pIt might, uh, be a little broken...

Time for a post-workout snack! Nope,
not that. That's a gift for Lady Elise.
Don't eat it, Effie... Don't eat it...

Oh, sorry for bumping into you like
that! Here, I actually wanted to give
you this gift.

Ah, shoot. Looks like I smashed the
gift in my pocket... Again. *sigh*

Wow, is this for me? Thank you!
The Day of Devotion sure makes you
feel warm and fuzzy.

I'm Effie. Looking forward to eating
festival food and stretching my gift-
giving muscles for Lady Elise!

I pushed myself to my limits in order
become a royal guard and protect
Lady Elise. Now I'm her retainer.$k$pBut despite her position, she's still
just as friendly when talking to me as
when we were kids. She's so kind.$k$pIf I hadn't met Lady Elise, I'd still be
in the slums of Nohr right now, with
no hope of anything greater.$k$pI have a hard time expressing how I
feel with words. Maybe that's why
this festival means so much to me.$k$pHeh, to think the two of us once
gobbled up stale crusts like they were
a delicacy after we'd been playing...$k$pI will never forget those days. Lady
Elise hasn't changed a bit. This gift
is but a small token of my gratitude.$k$pI'd better go deliver it to her!
On its way to you!
With all my heart!
A gift!
For you!
You didn't like it...
The Day of Devotion... A festival where you shove gifts into the arms of your beloved, huh...
What? You got me a gift? I'm so pleased.
Lady Elise has done sooo much for me... I have always been so grateful.
I can't carry delicate gifts. I...fear I would just break them.
There's going to be a feast? Um... How nice! Heh.
I would like to express my love and gratitude to everyone, just as Lady Elise does.
I brought a gift for you too. I hope you like it.
OK.
Sounds good.
I'll deliver.
